Unlimited I2I local/STD calls -- 2 GB 2G/4G data for 4G Handsets and 1 GB 2G/4G data for 2G/3G Handsets --  Applicable to new prepaid acquisitions within 30 calendar days from the day of recharge of First Recharge Offer .Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, I2I tariff @ Rs 0.10/min will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited Local Calls -- 1 GB 4G/2G data for 4G Handset or 50MB 4G/2G data for Non-4G Handset -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

For any customer found violating any of these conditions, I2I local & national tariff @ Rs 0.10/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
